¶ Again <WG3825> , ye have heard <WG191> that <WG3754> it hath been said <WG4483> by them of old time <WG744> , Thou shalt <WG1964> not <WG3756> forswear thyself <WG1964> , but <WG1161> shalt perform <WG591> unto the Lord <WG2962> thine <WG4675> oaths <WG3727> :
